name: Solitaire Card Game Collection
description:
Solitaire pack contains six classic game: solitaire(klondike), spider, freecell, canfield, pyramid and golf solitaire and it's all free!!

MAIN FEATURES:
+ Landscape or portrait modes
+ HD Display
+ Customizable cards & backgrounds
+ Preview hints
+ Unlimited undo
+ Smooth card animations
+ Drag and drop or simple select and move controls
+ Optimized for iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad
+ ios8 compatible
